name: Nathaniel Clyne
snippet: Nathaniel Edwin Clyne (born 5 April 1991) is an English footballer who plays as a right back for Liverpool.

name: José Enrique
snippet: José Enrique Sánchez Díaz, known as José Enrique, is a Spanish footballer who plays as a left back for English club Liverpool.

name: Kolo Touré
snippet: Kolo Abib Toure (born 19 March 1981) is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays for English club Liverpool as a defender.

name: Dejan Lovren
snippet: Dejan Lovren  (born 5 July 1989) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays as a central defender for Premier League club Liverpool and the Croatian national team.

name: James Milner
snippet: James Philip Milner (born 4 January 1986) is an English professional footballer who plays as a Winger or a Midfielder for Liverpool and the English national team.

name: Christian Benteke
snippet: Christian Benteke Liolo (born 3 December 1990) is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a striker for Premier League club Liverpool and the Belgium national team.

name: Philippe Coutinho
snippet: Philippe Coutinho Correia, known as Philippe Coutinho, or simply Coutinho, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for English club Liverpool and the Brazil national team as an attacking midfielder or winger.

name: Roberto Firmino
snippet: Roberto Firmino Barbosa de Oliveira (born 2 October 1991), commonly known as Roberto Firmino or solely as Firmino, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for English club Liverpool.

name: Jordan Henderson
snippet: Jordan Brian Henderson (born 17 June 1990) is an English professional footballer who captains Premier League club Liverpool. He also plays for the England national team.

name: Adam Lallana
snippet: Adam David Lallana (born 10 May 1988) is an English professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Premier League club Liverpool and the England national team.
